com.mygdx.game.gameLogic.LogicWorlds.WorldFeatures

Class LightRecharger

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mygdx.game.gameLogic.LogicWorlds.WorldFeatures.LightRecharger
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LightRechargerFeature

    public class LightRecharger
extends java.lang.Object
implements LightRechargerFeature
    Class that implements the light recharger item feature that can be used in all gameWorlds.
